name: yarn.nodemanager.container-executor.exit-code-file.timeout-ms
explanation: This configuration option is related to the task execution in YARN. The negative value might cause unexpected behavior during task execution.

name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.fetch.retry.interval-ms
explanation: This configuration option is related to the MapReduce task execution. The log indicates a speculative attempt, which might be related to the fetch retry interval.

name: yarn.cluster.max-application-priority
explanation: This configuration option is related to the priority of applications in YARN. The value of 0 might cause some applications to be neglected or not properly scheduled.
